=== About Me ===
My name is Will. Online I'm known to most as disassembler. I've been using Linux (Crunchbang, Ubuntu, Ubuntu Studio and Xubuntu) on and off since late 2007. It's only recently that I've started to become more active in the community. I only have a handful of experience, but I'm learning very quickly. I am interested in User Support and helping others in the NY Metro Area (NY/NJ) become more familiar with Linix and Ubuntu.
